# Task Lists with Nesting

- [ ] Main Task A
  - [ ] Subtask A.1
    - [x] Sub-subtask A.1.a (completed)
    - [ ] Sub-subtask A.1.b
      - [ ] Deep subtask A.1.b.i
        - [ ] Very deep subtask A.1.b.i.Î±
  - [x] Subtask A.2 (completed)
- [ ] Main Task B
  - [ ] Subtask B.1
    - [ ] Sub-subtask B.1.a
- [x] Main Task C (completed)
